about_the_game:
What's Missing? Is a first-person surreal puzzle game where you'll explore the never-ending loop of (almost) identical rooms. Spot the differences in order to escape this infinite magical loop of rooms.

SPOT THE DIFFERENCES ON A NEXT LEVEL

Challenge yourself with a fast ray of unique levels that makes you to think "outside the box", as besides physical objects, other abstract aspects might change as well like gravity, color, time etc. Explore these levels in different area's from a magical panetarium to the floating garden.

UNCOVER A DARK PAST

Follow Gregory's journey to escape this magical loop. But in order to escape, he must confront his dark past.

content_descriptors.notes: You can choke in the game.

name: What's Missing? Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: What's Missing? is a first-person, surreal puzzle game where you spot the differences between repeating identical rooms. Explore the limits of changes as it goes beyond just physical objects. Follow Gregory's journey to escape this magical loop and unveil the mystery of his dark past...
